long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Yoomi Chrome Extension revolutionizes physical and occupational therapy by automating patient note-taking and seamlessly integrating Home Exercise Program (HEP) creation within your EMR system.

Efficiently Create Detailed Notes: Automatically generate progress, treatment, and evaluation notes tailored to your organization’s standards. The system learns and adapts to your style with each use.

Voice-Activated HEPs: Effortlessly dictate home exercise programs using voice commands, making HEP creation faster and more intuitive.
Assured Compliance: Yoomi ensures full HIPAA compliance and is registered as a Class II medical device, upholding the highest standards of patient data security and device reliability.

Enhance your clinical practice with the Yoomi Chrome Extension, designed for today's healthcare professionals.

Discover more about how Yoomi can transform your patient care at https://yoomi.health.
